name: Team connect
description: Team connect is an integrated mobile application which is in sync with the Team Access Biometric Attendance device. The time access team app always allows the admin & the employees to stay connected. It offers a unique sets of features listed below : 1. Manual Selfie +Location punch  -The employee can click a picture to mark his attendance, which also records the Location of the employee along with the time stamp. This is sent as a notification to the admin along with a mail. 2. Leave Management - Leaves can be applied , which are sent in real time to the admin for approval & rejection  3. Expense Manager 4. Task manager 5. Credit application  6. Team connect : Integrated application which connects everyone on the chat room.
